chunk:
True Botanicals Phyto-Retinol Sleep Serum

Brand: True Botanicals

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Phenethyl Alcohol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil*, Coriandrum Sativum (Coriander)

Sativum (Coriander) Seed Oil, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil*, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil*, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil*, Sclerotium Gum, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract, Algin, Water, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Phytate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Citric Acid, Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Canarium Luzo

k Oil, Canarium Luzonicum Gum Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Tocopherol, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Astaxanthin*, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Primula Veris Flower Extract, Citral , Citronellol , Geraniol , Limonene , Linaloo

, Limonene , Linalool

Directions: Massage all over face and neck before moisturizing as part of your evening skincare routine
